source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_SEQ_00<tab>The well-dressed attendant has been sneaking glances at you since the moment you entered the Agora.
target: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_SEQ_00<tab>アゴラの使用人風の女性は、誰かを探しているようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_TODO_00<tab>Wait near the table reserved by House Leveilleur.
target: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB6C801 /var>で待機

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Ameliance.
target: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_TODO_01<tab>アメリアンスと話す

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Ameliance again.
target: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_TODO_02<tab>アメリアンスと再度話す

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_001<tab>You are... Pray forgive my directness, but you are none other than <var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, are you not?
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_001<tab>あなたは……！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>様でいらっしゃいますね？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_002<tab>(-Meryld-)It is a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance. I am Meryld, a humble servant of House Leveilleur.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_002<tab>(-メリルド-)わたくしはルヴェユール家にお仕えしている、
メリルドと申します。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_003<tab>(-Meryld-)I have heard that you are an exemplary artisan, is this true? If so, I should hope you will be intrigued by a proposal from my employer.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_003<tab>(-メリルド-)あの……あなた様は職人としても一流でいらっしゃると、
知人から聞いたのですが、本当でしょうか？
でしたら、ぜひご紹介したい案件があるのです。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_004<tab>(-Meryld-)You see, Lady Ameliance has been focused on a rather important social welfare endeavor of late, and seeks the aid of an artisan possessed of talent commensurate to the task at hand.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_004<tab>(-メリルド-)実はアメリアンス様の福祉活動の一環で、
「腕利きの職人」さんを探していたのです。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_005<tab>(-Meryld-)That glint in your eye tells me you wish to know more, so I invite you to speak with her in person. As fortune would have it, she is available at this very moment...
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_005<tab>(-メリルド-)もし興味がおありでしたら、
ぜひ直接、お話をお聞きになっていただきたく存じます。
それに、今ならちょうどいい時間……。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_006<tab>(-Meryld-)You needn't say another word; I shall arrange a seat for you under the House Leveilleur reservation. Pray make your way to the Last Stand at your earliest convenience, and await Lady Ameliance's arrival.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_006<tab>(-メリルド-)「ラストスタンド」に追加のお席を手配して参ります。
ご足労をおかけしますが、「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB6C801 /var>」で、
アメリアンス様をお待ちくださいませ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_010<tab>(-???-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I presume it was Meryld who sent you hither!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_010<tab>(-？？？？-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
メリルドさんに言われて、来てくれたのね！
本当に嬉しいわ！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_FLHAMINN_000_011<tab>Lured by the prospect of fresh endeavors, no doubt. I myself am guilty of the same─our Lady Leveilleur's correspondence has been full of the most tantalizing hints of late...
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_FLHAMINN_000_011<tab>元気にしてた？
ふふ、まさかこんなところで会うなんてね。
実は、アメリアンスさんとは文通する仲なの。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_012<tab>Surprise, surprise. What, not happy to see me?
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_012<tab>奇遇ね。
……ってなによ、その顔は。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_A1_000_001<tab><cough> I think I may be coming down with something...
target: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_A1_000_001<tab>……なんだかお腹が痛いかも

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_A1_000_002<tab>I just remembered, I uh... I left my oven fire burning at home.
target: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_A1_000_002<tab>ちょっと急用を思いだそうか……

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_014<tab>Relax, this ain't my venture. I'm here at F'lhaminn's invitation.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_014<tab>……そんなに警戒しなくてもいいでしょうに。
今日はただ、フ・ラミンさんの紹介で挨拶に来ただけよ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_015<tab>At the very least, I insist you join us for a cup of tea. Do sit down.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_015<tab>きっと、素敵なお茶会になるわ！
一杯も飲まずに帰るだなんて、言わないでね……！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_016<tab>...I see. So the Studium is to begin accepting foreign students, is it?
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_016<tab>……へえ。
あのシャーレアン魔法大学が、積極的に留学生の受け入れを？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_017<tab>Yes. As you know, Sharlayan has long closed its borders and avoided interfering in the affairs of other nations, bound by a single-minded focus to secure the safety of the peoples of this star.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_017<tab>ええ、シャーレアンは大撤収以降、
終末に備えるという「使命」を最優先に進めるため、
他国への干渉を控えて、門戸も狭めていたのだけれど……

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_018<tab>With the Final Days averted, the need for such drastic measures has dissipated. It took an awfully long time, and the near end of the world, but the winds of change have begun to blow─Sharlayan is trying to become an open nation.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_018<tab>終末という大きな脅威が去ったでしょう？
それで、開かれた国へ変わろうという新たな機運が、
シャーレアン全体で高まっているの。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_019<tab>That said, not all students can afford the costs incurred by studying abroad, let alone the steep price of the Studium's tuition. I can scarcely imagine how those from nations who suffered the worst of the Final Days might attempt such a feat.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_019<tab>けれども、誰もが留学の費用を工面できるわけじゃない……。
終末の被害に遭った地域なんかは、とくにね。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_020<tab>To ease the financial burden, I plan to offer all necessary school supplies free of charge. Furthermore, I have already begun talks with a number of Sharlayan families to propose an academic homestead program.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_020<tab>だから、学習に必要な物資を無償で提供しようと思うの。
それから、シャーレアンの家庭向けに、
「ホームステイ」を推奨する活動も始めたのよ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_FLHAMINN_000_021<tab>My, what a lovely initiative. A good old-fashioned cultural exchange is sure to be a mutually enlightening experience for the many Sharlayans who've remained cooped up with their dusty old tomes.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_FLHAMINN_000_021<tab>素晴らしい試みね……！
異文化との交流は、受け入れる側にとっても、
良い影響があるはずだもの。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_022<tab>Such is my hope. Alas, you will recall that a great deal of the Leveilleur fortune was poured into outfitting the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>, yes?
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_022<tab>でもね、うちの資産の大半は、
魔導船ラグナロクの改装につぎ込んでしまったでしょう？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_023<tab>As such, I cannot hope to carry out this endeavor long-term without a financial backer...a partner, if you will.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_023<tab>だから、継続的に活動していくことを考えると……
資金面でのパートナーが不可欠なの。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_024<tab>I'm all for noble causes, but you can't possibly be suggestin' we provide <var 1A 02 /var>everythin'<var 1A 01 /var> for free.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_024<tab>志には賛同するけれど……
まさか、すべて無償で提供するつもりじゃないでしょうね？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_025<tab>Oh, but of course I am! Were I to require students to repay the sum of their tuition after graduating─a sum few could afford─it would be no different from a loan, after all.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_025<tab>ふふ、もちろん留学生からはお金はいただけないわ。
卒業後に返済を迫るようじゃ、借金と変わらないもの。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_026<tab>I see... Well, I wish I could help, but with no prospect of income, I must respectfully decline your offer. It's not my intent to be rude, but I run a business, not a charity.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_026<tab>あら……そう。
出資も検討したいところだけど、利益の見込みがないのなら……
私は商売人なの、悪いわね。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_027<tab>I completely understand.
target: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_027<tab>その気持ちだけでも嬉しいわ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_028<tab>Recently, I find myself reminiscing over the time I spent in the Dravanian hinterlands...Fourchenault, the children, and myself─we were all so happy, living in the Emporium.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_028<tab>でも、私は今でも思い出すのよ。
低地ドラヴァニアにあった「<var 4A ((植民都市)) ((エンポリウム)) /var>」のことを……。
以前、私たちもあそこで暮らしていたの。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_029<tab>Idle though it may now be, the town was once tremendously effervescent, filled to the brim with inquiring souls who traveled from every corner of Eorzea in the pursuit of knowledge.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_029<tab>当時は、エオルゼア各地から知を求める人たちが集まって、
にぎやかで、活気があって、刺激的だったわ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_030<tab>Of course, it was not solely prospective students and researchers who journeyed there─far from it. As a hub for seekers of knowledge, no small few merchants made a living by procuring research supplies. In turn, they had immediate access to a reservoir of cutting-edge inventions.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_030<tab>もちろん、学生や研究者だけではなくて……
研究に必要な物資を売り込んだり、
最先端の品を求める商人さんも多かったわね！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_031<tab>Come to think of it, I daresay my contact at the East Aldenard Trading Company will be intrigued to hear of similar possibilities arising from our program. It was so very kind of Tataru to introduce us...
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_031<tab>そうそう、商人と言えばタタルちゃんの紹介で、
今度「東アルデナード商会」の方ともお会いする約束なの！
とっても気さくな方だって聞いているから、楽しみだわ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_032<tab>...The East Aldenard Trading Company?
target: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_032<tab>東アルデナード商会と……？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_033<tab>(Hold on a minute, now... What in the hells could possibly be giving this woman the confidence to act so bafflingly indifferent?)
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_033<tab>待て、待て、待て……冷静に考えるのよ。
なぜ、この女はこうも余裕があるの……？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_034<tab>(...Her husband's supposed to be a bigwig in that Forum o' theirs, ain't he? Stands to reason she may've heard rumblings of Sharlayan investing deeper in its education system. And in that case, it'd be wiser to invest now to reap the benefits later...)
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_034<tab>ハッ……たしか、旦那が哲学者議会の有力議員だったわね。
彼から、国を挙げての教育分野への投資を聞いている……？
だとしたら食い込むなら早い方が……。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_035<tab>(Better yet, the students who end up attending'll be the best and brightest o' their respective nations. If I make 'em feel indebted to me now, they'll be obligated to repay the favor in the future...once they've become powerful, distinguished members o' society, o' course.)
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_035<tab>しかも、集まる留学生は、各国最高のインテリ！
短期の留学でも、帰国後は祖国で活躍する可能性が高いッ！
今留学生に恩を売っておけば、将来的に好機が舞い込むことも……

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_036<tab>...I will also have need of a skilled artisan to procure the necessary supplies─no doubt the demand is sure to be immense!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_036<tab>……あとは、物資の調達なのだけれど、
「一流の職人さん」に頼めないかと思っているの！
きっと、反響も大きくなるでしょうから！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_037<tab>Goodness, just look at me prattle on when you've no interest in the matter! I really must be getting on home─countless preparations need be made ere my distinguished guest arrives.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_037<tab>ふふ、やる気がみなぎってきたわ！
さっそく、お家に帰って「東アルデナード商会」の方の、
おもてなしの準備をしなくっちゃ……

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_038<tab>...Hold that thought.
target: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_038<tab>……お待ちなさい。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_100_038<tab>I've come around to your proposal.
target: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_100_038<tab>先ほどの話、乗ることにするわ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_039<tab>Aye, and as your partner, the House of Splendors pledges its <var 1A 02 /var>considerable<var 1A 01 /var> support for your endeavor. An investment for the future, let's call it.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_039<tab>このロウェナ商会が、
アメリアンスさんのパートナーとして……
留学生の支援事業に、先行投資しましょう。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_040<tab>That is, on one condition: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> must be the sole supplier.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_ROWENA_000_040<tab>ただし！
収集品の調達先として、
この<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が専属でつくことが条件よ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_041<tab>My, how fortuitous! I did not expect you to pledge your support, but full glad am I that you have. Together, we can give countless students the opportunities they deserve!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_041<tab>ああ、なんて幸運なのかしら……！
ロウェナさんにそう言っていただけるなんて！
これで、どれほどの子どもたちが救われることでしょう……！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_042<tab>But what say you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Would you be able to spare some time from the seemingly infinite number of responsibilities that require your attention?
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_042<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんは、どうかしら？
お忙しいのは重々、承知しているのだけれど……

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_043<tab>Wonderful! I'm counting on both of you!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_043<tab>ああ、よかった……！
ふたりとも、とっても頼りにしているわ！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_050<tab>F'lhaminn and Rowena have already left if you're wondering─they intend to do some sightseeing in town before returning home. I do hope you were able to enjoy our teatime together. I can think of none more deserving of a brief respite.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_050<tab>ロウェナさんたちは、少し街を見てから帰るそうよ。
あなたも美味しいお茶で、少しはリラックスできたかしら？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_051<tab>I must apologize, however, for dragging you into this matter. You deserve a full explanation─but not here. Would you care to meet me at my home?
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_051<tab>それから、巻き込む形になってしまってごめんなさいね。
改めて、詳しい説明をしたいのだけれど……
お家に来ていただけないかしら？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_052<tab>Splendid. I shall be awaiting you at the Leveilleur estate.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_052<tab>……ありがとう、本当に頼もしいのね。
それじゃあ、「ルヴェユール邸」で待っているわ！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_060<tab>Thank you for humoring me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─and welcome once again!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_060<tab>いらっしゃい、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
あらためて歓迎するわ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_061<tab>For years, I've supported my children from afar as a sponsor of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn. Yet even though the Scions have disbanded, it has done little to diminish my desire to be of service.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_061<tab>これまでずっと、「暁の血盟」のスポンサーという形で、
子どもたちのサポートをしてきたつもりだったのだけれど、
その役目も、もう終わってしまったでしょう？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_062<tab>That is why I decided it is past time I made my own contribution to the world...to this star that you and my children have sacrificed so much to save.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_062<tab>だから今度はね……
あなたや子どもたちが命懸けで守ってくれたこの世界を、
私なりの方法で支えていきたいと思ったの。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_063<tab>But I am merely one person. My resources limited. Words can ill express how grateful I am for your aid.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_063<tab>でも、それも私ひとりの力では限界がある。
だから、あなたが手伝ってくれることになって心強いわ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_064<tab>In time, I hope you will come to see me not only as the mother of Alphinaud and Alisaie, but as your partner and friend. As I said before, I am counting on you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_064<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
これからはアルフィノとアリゼーの母としてだけではなく、
パートナーとしても、どうぞよろしくお願いしますね。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_065<tab>Now, there is, in fact, another reason I invited you here. The Leveilleur household will also be partaking in the homestead program, and I have already accepted a student.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_065<tab>そうそう、お家に来てもらったのには理由があるのよ。
実はこのルヴェユール家でも、ホームステイの試みとして、
留学生をひとり受け入れることになっているの。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_066<tab>She comes from a family of accomplished alchemists, hailing from Thavnair. Meryld has already gone to fetch her from the port, so I imagine she will arrive ere long.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_066<tab>メリルドさんが港まで迎えに行ってくれたから、
もう間もなく、サベネアから女の子が来てくれるわ。
とっても優秀な、錬金術師の子だそうよ！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_067<tab>Lady Ameliance, I pray I did not keep you waiting overlong. Miss Miladeen has arrived.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_067<tab>失礼いたします、アメリアンス様。
ミラディーン様をお連れいたしました。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_068<tab>N-N-Nice to meet you! I am Miladeen, freshly arrived from Thavnair. It is a p-pleasure to make your acquaintance!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_068<tab>よ、よ、よ……よろしくお願いします！！
サベネアから参りました、ミラディーンと申します！
今日から、た、たいへんお世話になります！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_069<tab>Oh, the pleasure is all mine, I'm sure! You must be utterly exhausted after such a long voyage.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_069<tab>まあ、あなたがミラディーンちゃんね！
遠路はるばる、本当によく来てくれたわ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_070<tab>I am Ameliance, and standing beside me is none other than─
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_070<tab>私がアメリアンスよ、どうぞよろしくね。
そしてこちらが……

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_071<tab>O-Oh, I know! It's <var 08 E905 ((Mistress Alisaie)) ((Master Alphinaud)) /var>, isn't it!?
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_071<tab>はっはい、存じています！
<var 08 E905 ((ご息女のアリゼーさん)) ((ご子息のアルフィノさん)) /var>ですね！？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_072<tab>...Hah! I'm afraid not, my dear.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_072<tab>……ふふっ、ふふふふ。
残念だけれど、違うわ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_073<tab>This charming personage beside me is in fact <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, my business partner. Better known as the hero who saved our star from the Final Days.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_073<tab>こちらは私のお仕事上のパートナー、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんよ。
そして……終末から世界を救った、英雄さんでもあるわ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_074<tab>Ah! I'm so sorry, it was rude of me to presume! I have heard much and more of your many heroic deeds in Thavnair, but I've never had a face to put to the name...
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_074<tab>あわわ、ごめんなさい！　とんだご無礼を！
サベネア島でのご活躍も存じておりましたが、
お顔を拝見したことがなくて……！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_075<tab>P-Putting that aside, it is a dream come true for me to finally stand in the magnificent halls of the Studium...I could collapse with happiness on this very spot!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_075<tab>憧れの魔法大学に来ることができて、
なにより、本当に感激しているんです……！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_076<tab>With these dignified walls surrounding me, I feel as though I stand in the very annals of history itself! My mind wanders to the countless brilliant minds who made discovery after discovery here.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_076<tab>この歴史を感じさせる重厚な学び舎の中で、
幾人もの偉大な賢人たちが、学業に打ち込んできたんですね！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_077<tab>Erm, Miss Miladeen... I'm afraid it is not the Studium, but the Leveilleur estate in which you stand. This residence shall be your lodgings for the duration of your stay.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_077<tab>ミラディーン様……こちらは魔法大学の校舎ではなく、
ルヴェユール邸、あなた様の下宿先となります。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_078<tab>It may take some getting used to, but it is my wish that you come to feel at home here.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_078<tab>慣れるまでは不便をかけてしまうかもしれないけれど、
本当の家だと思ってくつろいでちょうだいね。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_079<tab>Th-This...is your <var 1A 02 /var>home<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_079<tab>こっ……これがお家……！？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_080<tab>Ahem! Though I have much to learn─and the thought of your present impression of me fills me with dread─I hope that we can get along!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_080<tab>あのっ、世間知らずで未熟者ですが、
しばらくの間、どうぞよろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_081<tab>Oh, you needn't be so formal. Tell me, what can we do to make you feel more comfortable?
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_081<tab>礼儀正しくて可愛い子だわ。
でも、そんなに畏まらなくていいのよ。
……そうだ、ミラちゃんって呼んでもいいかしら？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_082<tab>I-I know! Please call me Mila! That's what my folks back home call me, while Miladeen is...usually reserved for when I'm in trouble...
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MILADEEN_000_082<tab>は、はいっ！
どうぞ、お好きに呼んでください！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_083<tab>Pray forgive me, but I'm afraid I must continue to observe formalities, Miss Miladeen. If it please you, I shall escort you to your room.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_MERYLD_000_083<tab>それでは、ミラディーン様。
お部屋へご案内いたします。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_084<tab>A number of other families will also be opening up their homes to students from abroad in the coming days. I must set a good example as the first host mother, for if all goes to plan, we can expand the program to include even more students!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_084<tab>他のいくつかの家庭でも、同様にホームステイが始まるわ。
初めてのホストマザーとして、私も頑張らなくっちゃね！
ここでうまくいけば、本格的に事業が始められる。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_085<tab>Let us waste no time─there is plenty of work to be done!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_085<tab>ということで、さっそくお仕事のお話なのだけれど……
あなたに調達をお願いしてもいいかしら？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_086<tab>Classes at the Studium will begin once students have had time to settle in. I would like to use this period to procure all of the necessities needed for their matriculation.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_086<tab>留学生たちが落ち着き次第、授業に合流できるそうなの。
それまでに、入学に必要なものを用意してもらえたら嬉しいわ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_087<tab>You may find any materials you need by speaking with Synnove, the apothecary, in the Agora. Let us give the students the welcome they deserve!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS670_04523_AMELIANCE_000_087<tab>必要な素材は、アゴラにいる、
「よろず屋 シンノヴ」さんが取り揃えてくださるそうよ。
よろしくお願いね、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
